verses.verse: In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with his <S%H7186>sore<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> the <S%H1281>piercing<s%> <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> even <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> that <S%H6129>crooked<s%> <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6031>sing<s%> ye unto her, A <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of red <S%H2531>wine.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H5341>keep<s%> it; I will <S%H8248>water<s%> it every <S%H7281>moment:<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> any <S%H6485>hurt<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it, I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> it <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Fury <S%H2534><s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> in me: <S%H4310>who<s%> would <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%> against me in <S%H4421>battle?<s%> I would <S%H6585>go<s%> through them, I would <S%H6702>burn<s%> them <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Or <S%H176><s%> let him take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength,<s%> that he may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with me; and he shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with me.

He shall cause them that <S%H935>come<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to take <S%H8327>root:<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6692>blossom<s%> and <S%H6524>bud,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H8570>fruit.<s%>

Hath he <S%H5221>smitten<s%> him, as he <S%H4347>smote<s%> those that <S%H5221>smote<s%> him? or is he <S%H2026>slain<s%> according to the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> of them that are <S%H2026>slain<s%> by him?

In <S%H5432>measure,<s%> when it shooteth <S%H7971>forth,<s%> thou wilt <S%H7378>debate<s%> with it: he <S%H1898>stayeth<s%> his <S%H7186>rough<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the east <S%H6921>wind.<s%>

By <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> shall the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> be <S%H3722>purged;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2403>sin;<s%> when he <S%H7760>maketh<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as <S%H68>chalkstones<s%> <S%H1615><s%> that are beaten in <S%H5310>sunder,<s%> the <S%H842>groves<s%> and <S%H2553>images<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> stand <S%H6965>up.<s%>

Yet <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1219>defensed<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H910>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H7971>forsaken,<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H7462>feed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall he lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H5585>branches<s%> thereof.

When the <S%H7105>boughs<s%> thereof are <S%H3001>withered,<s%> they shall be broken <S%H7665>off:<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and set them on <S%H215>fire:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H998>understanding:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> them will <S%H3808>not<s%> have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them, and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> them will show them no <S%H2603>favor.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall beat <S%H2251>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>channel<s%> <S%H7641><s%> of the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>stream<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall be <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one,<s%> O ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> shall be <S%H8628>blown,<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> which were ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
